name: Frozen Coco Vanilla Yogurt
preparation: Heat coconut milk and add tea leaves. Let steep for 5 minutes, strain, and chill completely.
Combine all ingredients together in a bowl, mix well. Transfer the mixture to freezable container.

Seal the container and put in the freezer for at least 4 hours. Itâ€™s best if you can stir the yogurt around every hour or so, just to keep it soft. Once frozen, allow it to thaw a little before serving.
